title: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist even when unchanged
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When opening a Java file and placing the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call, code assist does not appear and the file becomes dirtied even when there are no changes made.
EB: The file should not become dirtied and code assist should appear when placing the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
3. Press Ctrl+Space to trigger code assist.
